Package renderer

Class BasicRayTracer

java.lang.Object
renderer.RayTracerBase
renderer.BasicRayTracer
public class BasicRayTracer
extends RayTracerBase
BasicRayTracer is tracing rays from the camera to the scene and calculate the color of the point the ray hits

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  BasicRayTracer.Index2D
    Index2D is an internal helper class representing a 2D index (x,y) in a matrix

      get the color of a single pixel by sending ray from the camera through it and calculate it's color
      Specified by:
      traceRay in class RayTracerBase
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the color of the pixel the ray hit in the view plane

    • findClosestIntersection

      private Intersectable.GeoPoint findClosestIntersection​(Ray ray)
      find the ray's closest intersection with GeoPoint.
      Parameters:
      ray - ray from the camera
      Returns:
      closest geoPoint intersection (if there are no intersection return null)

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint gp, Ray ray)
      wrapper function to recursive function calcColor. used to add the color the ambient light effect.
      Parameters:
      gp - a GeoPoint point in the scene that viewed on the view plane
      ray - the ray that hits the geoPoint
      Returns:
      the color of the pixel that view the geoPoint

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint geoPoint, Ray ray, int level, double k)
      calculating the color of a geoPoint considering the geometry's color, local effects, and global effects (global effects are calculating recursively. the recursive call is at calcGlobalEffect function).
      Parameters:
      geoPoint - a GeoPoint point in the scene that viewed on the view plane
      ray - the ray that intersects the geoPoint
      level - maximum allowing recursion depth
      k - color's initial coefficient that multiplied in each recursive calling
      Returns:
      the color of the pixel that view the geoPoint

    • calcGlobalEffects

      private Color calcGlobalEffects​(Intersectable.GeoPoint gp, Vector v, int level, double k)
      calculating color's effects from reflection and refraction rays
      Parameters:
      gp - the geoPoint that it's color is calculated
      v - normalized vector form the light source to the geoPoint
      level - recursion depth level
      k - transparency and reflection coefficients multiplier
      Returns:
      color from global effects

    • calcGlobalEffect

      private Color calcGlobalEffect​(Ray ray, int level, double kx, double kkx)
      Calculate the color effect of the geometry that intersected from the reflected or refracted ray by calling recursively to calcColor function
      Parameters:
      ray - the ray that hits the geoPoint
      level - recursion depth level
      kx - either transparency or reflection coefficient of the current calculated geometry
      kkx - either transparency or reflection coefficient from the last recursion level
      Returns:
      calculated global effect's color

    • constructReflectedRay

      private Ray constructReflectedRay​(Point3D point, Vector v, Vector normal)
      construct the reflected ray of the ray that hits the geometry.
      Parameters:
      point - the point on the geometry surface the ray hit
      v - direction vector of the ray from the camera
      normal - normal vector to the geometry from point
      Returns:
      reflected ray

    • constructRefractedRay

      private Ray constructRefractedRay​(Point3D point, Vector v, Vector normal)
      construct the refracted ray of the ray that hits the geometry
      Parameters:
      point - the point on the geometry surface the ray hit
      v - direction vector of the ray from the camera
      normal - normal vector to the geometry from point
      Returns:
      refracted ray

    • calcColorFromBeamOfRays

      private Color calcColorFromBeamOfRays​(Ray r, Vector n, int level, double kx, double kkx, double kGlossyOrClear)
      calculating recursively the global color effect of geoPoint from beam of rays that scatter around a central ray.
      Parameters:
      r - the central ray
      n - normal to the geoPoint
      level - recursion depth
      kx - either transparency or reflection coefficient of the current calculated geometry
      kkx - either transparency or reflection coefficient from the last recursion level
      kGlossyOrClear - coefficient of glossy or clear
      Returns:
      average color from the beam of the rays

    • colorFromRegularBeam

      private Color colorFromRegularBeam​(Vector rVector, int level, double kx, double kkx, Point3D p0, Vector n, TargetSurface targetSurface)
      calculate the color of reflection/refraction ray to glossy surfaces/diffused glass when adaptive super sampling is not activated
      Parameters:
      rVector - reflection/refraction vector
      level - reflection/refraction recursion depth
      kx - either transparency or reflection coefficient of the current calculated geometry
      kkx - either transparency or reflection coefficient from the last recursion level
      p0 - source point of the reflection/refraction ray
      n - normal to the geoPoint
      targetSurface - ray's target surface
      Returns:

    • adaptiveSuperSampling

      private Color adaptiveSuperSampling​(double kx, double kkx, int level, Point3D p0, TargetSurface targetSurface)
      calculate the color of reflection/refraction using adaptive super sampling wrapper to recursive method
      Parameters:
      kx - either transparency or reflection coefficient of the current calculated geometry
      kkx - either transparency or reflection coefficient from the last recursion level
      level - reflection/refraction recursion depth
      p0 - source point of the reflection/refraction ray
      targetSurface - ray's target surface
      Returns:
      color of the the reflection/refraction source point

    • adaptiveSuperSampling

      private Color adaptiveSuperSampling​(Color[][] colors, int superSamplingLevel, BasicRayTracer.Index2D topLeft, BasicRayTracer.Index2D topRight, BasicRayTracer.Index2D bottomLeft, BasicRayTracer.Index2D bottomRight, double kx, double kkx, int level, Point3D p0, TargetSurface targetSurface)
      calculate recursively, using adaptive super sampling, the average color of the target surface for glossy surfaces/diffused glass reflection
      Parameters:
      colors - matrix of calculated colors
      superSamplingLevel - super sampling recursion depth
      topLeft - Index (in colors) of the top left vertex in the square
      topRight - Index (in colors) of the top right vertex in the square
      bottomLeft - Index (in colors) of the bottom left vertex in the square
      bottomRight - Index (in colors) of the bottom right vertex in the square
      kx - either transparency or reflection coefficient of the current calculated geometry
      kkx - either transparency or reflection coefficient from the last recursion level
      level - reflection/refraction recursion depth
      p0 - source point of the reflection/refraction ray
      targetSurface - ray's target surface
      Returns:
      color of the the reflection/refraction source point

    • calcColor

      public Color calcColor​(Point3D p0, TargetSurface targetSurface, BasicRayTracer.Index2D index, int level, double kx, double kkx)
      invoking calcGlobalEffect to point on the target surface of glossy/diffused
      Parameters:
      p0 - source point of the reflection/refraction ray
      targetSurface - ray's target surface
      index - index in the color's array
      level - reflection/refraction recursion depth
      kx - either transparency or reflection coefficient of the current calculated geometry
      kkx - kkx either transparency or reflection coefficient from the last recursion level
      Returns:
      color of the point on the target surface

    • calcLocalEffects

      private Color calcLocalEffects​(Intersectable.GeoPoint geoPoint, Ray ray, double k)
      calculate color's local effects (diffusive and shininess) of single geoPoint
      Parameters:
      geoPoint - point on geometry surface
      ray - ray from the camera to the point
      Returns:
      calculated color with effects

    • calcDiffusive

      private Color calcDiffusive​(double kd, Vector l, Vector n, Color lightIntensity)
      calculating diffusion color. formula: (Kdגˆ™|lגˆ™n|)גˆ™lightIntensity
      Parameters:
      kd - diffusion coefficient
      l - vector from the light source to the current point
      n - normal vector to the geometry in the current point
      lightIntensity - light's color intensity
      Returns:
      diffusion color

    • calcSpecular

      private Color calcSpecular​(double ks, Vector l, Vector n, Vector v, int nShininess, Color lightIntensity)
      calculating shininess color.
      Parameters:
      ks - shininess coefficient
      l - vector from the light source to the current geoPoint
      n - normal vector to the geometry in the current point
      v - vector from the camera to the point
      nShininess - objectג€™s shininess
      lightIntensity - light's color intensity
      Returns:
      shininess color

    • transparency

      private double transparency​(LightSource lightSource, Vector l, Vector n, Intersectable.GeoPoint geoPoint)
      calculating the effective transparency's coefficient of all the geometries between a geoPoint to a light source
      Parameters:
      lightSource - the light source that ray from the geoPoint hit it
      l - normalized vector from the light source to the geoPoint
      n - normal vector to the geoPoint
      geoPoint - a geoPoint in the scene
      Returns:
      effective transparency's coefficient
